name: OAHKNUT
description:
CONTROLS

Change Graphics Quality from the start screen or by pressing ESC

Quit/Restart/Resume: T or ESC
Right Mouse: Shield
Left Mouse: Attack
Space: Roll
WASD: Move

OVERVIEW

Hey there! This is my first attempt at making a game.
All assets made by myself except for a few Quixel surface textures and ghost and creature sounds (from my daughter).

Catch woodland spirits and light the bonfires in this short fall-themed romp.
Play in speed run mode and post your fastest times or just chill and enjoy.

Created as part of:
#GreatAutumnGameJam2021 

Thanks for playing!
Tyler

INSTALLATION
Unzip and run the .exe

TOOLS

  • Engine: Unreal 5
  • Sound Editing: Audacity
  • Modeling: Cinema 4D / Blender
  • Graphics + UI: Illustrator / Photoshop
  • Music: FL Studio
